Method Detail

isSelfClosing

public final boolean isSelfClosing()

setSelfClosing

public void setSelfClosing(boolean b)
Sets this tag's indicator for self closing.
If it is set to true and this tag has children then the children will be copied to the parent. If there is no parent then the children will be destroyed.

Parameters:
b -

getChild

public final Tag getChild(java.lang.String name)
Finds the child by name. Children with the same name can be differentiated like so name;0 name;1.

Parameters:
name -
Returns:
The child or null if it was not found.

getChildAt

public final Tag getChildAt(int index)
Alias for (Tag)FullNode.getChild(int).

Parameters:
index -
Returns:
The child at the index.

indexOf

public final int indexOf(Tag tag)

indexOfForName

private final int indexOfForName()
Calls indexOfForName(this) on the parent Tag if one exists. If there is no parent tag then 0 is returned.

Returns:
The index of this tag or 0 if it has no parent. -1 is possible and should be a red flag that the using code circumvented either the addChild() or removeChild() methods.
See Also:
indexOfForName(Tag)

indexOfForName

protected final int indexOfForName(Tag tag)
Finds the tag counting all the tags with the same name along the way. This count is returned.

Parameters:
tag - Tag to be found
Returns:
The number of tags with the same name that appear before tag or -1 if tag was not found.

getCanonicalName

public final java.lang.String getCanonicalName()
Creates the fully qualified name associated with this tag.

Returns:
The fully qualified name associated with this tag.
